abstract: Taiwan’s China Development Industrial Bank (CDIB) has sued Morgan Stanley in a U.S. court to recover millions of dollars in losses it suffered from its investment in a residential mortgage product.
snippet: Taiwan’s China Development Industrial Bank (CDIB) has sued Morgan Stanley in a U.S. court to recover millions of dollars in losses it suffered from its investment in a residential mortgage product.
lead_paragraph: Taiwan’s China Development Industrial Bank (CDIB) has sued Morgan Stanley in a U.S. court to recover millions of dollars in losses it suffered from its investment in a residential mortgage product, Reuters reports.

headline.main: Morgan Stanley Sued by Taiwan Bank
